content: DX 9-HSN Powder-actuated decking tool Digitally enabled, fully automatic, high-productivity, stand-up powder-actuated nailer for fastening metal decks ### Categories: Home > Products > Power tools > Direct fastening tools- - - ### FEATURES:Features Revolutionary design – upright working position for high speed of use and long-term user comfort Ergonomically designed handle to enhance user comfort Adjustable power regulator – precise control for more reliable fastenings Unique piston brake system helps to prevent fasteners punching through the deck Easy to clean and maintain on jobsites Applications Fastening metal roof decks to 1/8 to 3/8 thick bar joists with X-HSN nails Fastening metal floor decks to 1/8 to 3/8 bar joists and light-gauge steel structures with X-HSN nails ### TECHNICAL DATA: Dimensions (LxWxH): 39.3 x 17.5 x 7.4 in Weight: 30 lb. Fastener Intake: Collated Technical Data | Dimensions (LxWxH) | 39.3 x 17.5 x 7.4 in | Weight | 30 lb | Fastener Intake | Collated | Fastener length range | 0.47 - 1.06 in | Cartridge type | .27 caliber short, 6.8/11 M40 | Automatic piston return | Yes | Bluetooth | Yes | Hilti Connect | Yes | Power (max.) | 355 J | Power regulation | Yes | Piston type | X-9-HSN ### ITEMS- 3605204 -
